entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow late this evening. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
